archimate:Requirement.name: SY.2.4.5d: d) checks are performed to confirm that only intended changes have been made (e.g. by comparing code against a control version or checking before and after contents of key records, such as within customer master files)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
